definition[0]: an impressive view of a wide area of land
example[1]: The tower offers a panorama of the city.
definition[1]: a description or series of pictures that shows all the features of a subject, historical period etc
example[2]: a panorama of life in England 400 years ago
definition[2]: a British television programme about politics and current affairs which is broadcast on the BBC and is known for its investigative journalism (=when a reporter tries to find out the true facts about something that is happening in politics, business etc)
